DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct analyze role TSH level TPOAb status early pregnancy use information assessment risk gestational diabetes mellitus different week gestation FT4 level normal .
DOC.brief_title: Maternal Thyroid Function Early Pregnancy Their Relationship With Gestational Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.detailed_description: A total 7,729 woman singleton pregnancy receive antenatal care Shanghai First Maternity Infant Hospital , Tongji University School Medicine December 2012 March 2014 include study . All woman undergo screen thyroid function ( TSH , FT4 TPOAb ) first antenatal visit 75 g oral glucose tolerance test 24-28 week gestation . The correlation combination TSH level TPOAb status risk gestational diabetes mellitus analyze .
DOC.criteria: Criteria : 1 . ≤19+6 week gestation first antenatal visit ; 2. singleton pregnancy ; 3 . FT4 level within normal range ; 4 . TSH level normal beyond normal range . 1. age < 18 year > 40 year ; 2. thyroid disease history pregnancy , e.g . hyperthyroidism , clinical hypothyroidism malignant tumor thyroid , regardless medication treatment need ; 3. twin multiple gestation ; 4. diagnose diabetes mellitus pregnancy , fast bloodglucose level ≥ 7.0 mmol/L HbA1C≥6.5 % first antenatal visit ; 5. disease cause abnormal glycometabolism severe comorbidities diseases cause abnormal glycometabolism .
